# Examples

This directory contains example Lucia programs.

The files are sorted by difficulty, indicated by the numeric prefix in the file name.

## List of examples

* [01_hello_world.lc](./01_hello_world.lc)  
  A basic Hello World example.  
  Includes: [Function definition](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Function call](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Built-in functions](../language-syntax.md#built-in-functions), [String definition](../language-syntax.md#strings)

* [02_is_prime.lc](./02_is_prime.lc)  
  Demonstrates how to check whether a number is prime.  
  Includes: [Function definition](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Function call](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Built-in functions](../language-syntax.md#built-in-functions), [If statement](../language-syntax.md#if-statements), [While loop](../language-syntax.md#while-loops), [Variable definition](../language-syntax.md#variables--types), [Operators](../language-syntax.md#operators), [Number definition](../language-syntax.md#numbers)

* [03_bubble_sort.lc](./03_bubble_sort.lc)  
  Sorts a list using the bubble sort algorithm.  
  Includes: [Function definition](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Function call](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Built-in functions](../language-syntax.md#built-in-functions), [If statement](../language-syntax.md#if-statements), [For loop](../language-syntax.md#for-loops), [List definition](../language-syntax.md#lists), [Variable definition](../language-syntax.md#variables--types), [Operators](../language-syntax.md#operators), [Number definition](../language-syntax.md#numbers)

* [04_fib.lc](./04_fib.lc)  
  Calculates Fibonacci numbers using recursion, iteration, [Binet's formula](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binet%27s_formula), and Lucia's pattern recognition.  
  Includes: [Function definition](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Function call](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Built-in functions](../language-syntax.md#built-in-functions), [If statement](../language-syntax.md#if-statements), [For loop](../language-syntax.md#for-loops), [Recursion](../language-syntax.md#recursion), [Pattern recognition](../language-syntax.md#pattern-recognition), [Variable definition](../language-syntax.md#variables--types), [Operators](../language-syntax.md#operators), [Number definition](../language-syntax.md#numbers), [Tuple unpacking](../language-syntax.md#tuple-unpacking--multiple-assignment)

* [05_simple_repl_calc.lc](./05_simple_repl_calc.lc)  
  A simple REPL-based calculator.  
  Includes: [Function definition](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Function call](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Built-in functions](../language-syntax.md#built-in-functions), [If statement](../language-syntax.md#if-statements), [While loop](../language-syntax.md#while-loops), [Variable definition](../language-syntax.md#variables--types), [Operators](../language-syntax.md#operators), [Number definition](../language-syntax.md#numbers), [String definition](../language-syntax.md#strings)

* [06_hello_world_lasm.lc](./06_hello_world_lasm.lc)  
  Uses inline Lucia Assembly (LASM) to print 'Hello, World!'.  
  Includes: [Import](../language-syntax.md#importing-modules), [Function call](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Built-in functions](../language-syntax.md#built-in-functions), [String definition](../language-syntax.md#strings), [Tuple unpacking](../language-syntax.md#tuple-unpacking--multiple-assignment), [Map definition](../language-syntax.md#maps), [Variable definition](../language-syntax.md#variables--types)

* [07_tic_tac_toe.lc](./07_tic_tac_toe.lc)  
  A Tic Tac Toe game using `styledprint`.  
  Includes: [Function definition](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Function call](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Built-in functions](../language-syntax.md#built-in-functions), [If statement](../language-syntax.md#if-statements), [While loop](../language-syntax.md#while-loops), [List definition](../language-syntax.md#lists), [Variable definition](../language-syntax.md#variables--types), [Operators](../language-syntax.md#operators), [Number definition](../language-syntax.md#numbers), [String definition](../language-syntax.md#strings)

* [08_rule110.lc](./08_rule110.lc)  
  Implements a [Rule 110 cellular automaton](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rule_110) using a rolling bitwise state.  
  Includes: [Function definition](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Function call](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Built-in functions](../language-syntax.md#built-in-functions), [If statement](../language-syntax.md#if-statements), [For loop](../language-syntax.md#for-loops), [Variable definition](../language-syntax.md#variables--types), [Operators](../language-syntax.md#operators), [Bitwise operators](../language-syntax.md#bitwise-operators), [Number definition](../language-syntax.md#numbers)

* [09_game_of_life.lc](./09_game_of_life.lc)  
  An implementation of [Conway's Game of Life](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway%27s_Game_of_Life).  
  Includes: TODO

* [10_bouncing_square_raylib.lc](./10_bouncing_square_raylib.lc)  
  A bouncing square example using the [Raylib](https://www.raylib.com/) bindings.  
  Includes: TODO

* [11_quine.lc](./11_quine.lc)  
  A [quine](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quine_%28computing%29) that prints its own source code.  
  Includes: TODO

* [12_custom_lang.lc](./12_custom_lang.lc)  
  A simple custom language compiler written in Lucia.  
  Includes: TODO
